Articles.Content:
Hi all.

After successfully docking one of my modules to my space station, and I restart my game, the module is no longer attached. Its just floating next to my core module...

How do I lock the docks, so they dont release when I quit the game?
Are you positive you docked? Did the camera view change? Do you have other docked parts or is this your first? I have 6 parts on my station and they never detached like that.
I've never seen that happen, either. Any mods installed?
Make sure to quicksave (F5) after everything important. Hold F9 to load the last save.
